original_text: But a field where only weeds and thorn bushes grow is worth nothing. God will very soon speak against that ground. In the end, fire will burn all of it.
korean_text: 만일 가시와 엉겅퀴를 내면 버림을 당하고 저주함에 가까워 그 마지막은 불사름이 되리라

sentences.original_text: But a field where only weeds grow
God will very soon speak against that ground
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님께서 아주 곧 그 땅을 대적하여 말씀하실 것입니다

sentences.original_text: fire will burn all of it
sentences.korean_translation: 불이 그 모든 것을 태울 것입니다
